subject: Upcoming website changes
description:
At the end of the last year I made quite a few changes in the bug tracker by introducing a new theme and writing a plugin which changes the page layout. My New Year's resolution is to continue this process and finally make the main page usable.

{TODO}
# Integrate Redmine into the main website
** create a unified "authentication system":http://www.redmine.org/projects/redmine/wiki/Alternativecustom_authentication_HowTo
** link main page news items to projects by setting appropriate categories
# Migrate forum to Yii _OR_ write a plugin extending Redmine's forum
# Fix CSS style in Redmine
# Use the same theme for all pages
** I was quite proud of making the main page theme after years of not touching HTML and CSS :-), but it's unsuitable for smaller screens
** the current Redmine theme will be used as the base and extended
** colour palette will probably change from black/red/blue/green/white to just black/red?/dark grey/grey/white to resemble W:ET style
** main page should be tiled instead of divided into left and right panels
*** tile with clear and succinct project description and visible link to downloads
*** tile with no more than four screenshots
*** tile with short news items
*** possibly a tile with latest project activity
# Add server browser
# Finish admin panel with update server, master server, MOTD server, etc. settings
